metadata.name: Crypto Polar Bear Club #1
metadata.description: Crypto Polar Bear Club is a custom collection of 8,888 3D unique hand-drawn Crypto Polar Bears who live on the Ethereum network! Crypto Polar Bear Club is not only a piece of art but a token. This token unlocks endless opportunities for giveaways, private events, and clothing drops. CPBC's goal is to build a strong networking community for thousands to join!
